sourcesContent:
import "./cart-summary-card.css"; import { totalCartPrice, totalOffer, totalMRP } from "../../pages/cart/CartFunctions"; export const CartSummaryCard = ({ product }) => { return (
PRICE DETAILS

Cart Total (1 item)

₹{totalMRP()}

Cart Discount

-₹{totalOffer()}

Sub Total

₹{totalCartPrice()}

Shipping Charges

FREE

Grand Total

₹{totalCartPrice()}

); };
